Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1610 Ohio Fire Code

1610.011992 edition adopted. 1610.02Purpose. 1610.03Application of Code. 1610.04Enforcement; responsibilities of Municipal Fire Safety Inspector. 1610.05Compliance required. 1610.06Posting arson laws. 1610.07Setting fires which spread. 1610.08Responsibilities upon discovery of unfriendly fires. 1610.09Inspections. 1610.10Sale and use of fire equipment; service and repair of equipment. 1610.11File and distribution copies. 1610.12Conflicts of laws. 1610.13Permit fees. 1610.99Penalty.

CROSS REFERENCES

Power to regulate elevators, stairways and fire escapes - see Ohio R.C. 715.26

Adoption of technical codes - see Ohio R.C. 731.231

Power to regulate against fires - see Ohio R.C. 737.27, 3737.08

Right to examine buildings - see Ohio R.C. 737.34 et seq., 3737.14

State Fire Marshal - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 3737

Petroleum liquids and gases - see Ohio R.C. 3737.17 et seq.

Dry cleaning and dyeing - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 3739

Gasoline, oils and paint - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 3741

Explosives; fire prevention - see Ohio R.C. Ch. 3743

Driving over fire hoses - see TRAF. 432.26

Fire lanes - see TRAF. 452.18

Arson - see GEN. OFF. 642.09

Fire hazards - see P. & Z. 1270.23
